episodes.title: Do Jehovah's Witnesses REALLY Care About Families?
episodes.description: The Governing Body has a lot to say about how much they value family. Books, magazines, videos, cartoons telling us all how to have a happy family life by means of the Bible. But how are families treated inside Jehovah's Witnesses? Does the sanctity and health of your family come above all else in 'god's organization?' TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & "Motivated Forgetting" Theory: How They Dismiss Lost Souls of the Past
episodes.description: As Jehovah's Witnesses celebrate recent changes to 'god's organization' why don't they put more thought to the millions of people who came before them and were obeying teachings that were, in the least, wrong... and at the most, designed lies. Does 'new light' in 2024 make up for decades of how 'old light' negatively impacted the lives of Witnesses in the past? Are the Governing Body hoping everyone forgets? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: 2024 August Watchtower: Jehovah's Chariot Changes Direction on Disfellowshipping, Marking & more!
episodes.description: The Governing Body has been asserting control over Jehovah's Witnesses since installing the disfellowshipping arrangement in the 1950's. Losing their religious status... and millions of dollars in handouts in several countries, has led Jehovah to pull the emergency brake on his chariot and change direction. We take a closer look at the 2024 August Watchtower and the changes to marking, disfellowshipping, judicial meetings and more! What could go wrong? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Greatest Hits Vol. III: Supporting Evil Dictators and Adam's 'Urges' Explained!
episodes.description: We reach deep into the Jehovah's Witness historical grab bag to look at how Jesus' handpicked guy in New York voiced his tacit support for a certain German dictator's ideologies, as well as a closer look at the first man Adam's journey from lonely bachelor, surrounded by animals, to his first date with Eve. There are a few 'surprises!' TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Angels: The Invisible Superheroes of the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Move over Ironman, Deadpool and Storm... Jehovah's Witnesses have the REAL superheroes. The 2024 convention season is here... and the real, invisible superheroes hovering above each book cart are back in the spotlight! We look at the long history of the winged, white males that helped Noah gather two kangaroos and guided that new unbaptized publisher in placing their first Watchtower magazine! TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Dysfunctional World of Sex Inside Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses invite themselves into your bedroom by instructing grown, consenting adults how they can touch each other. Their teachings on sex range from hilarious, to soul crushing, by claiming an ancient book filled with sexual depravity should be our guide when our clothes come off. Touching yourself is off limits, even demonized. Listen in as we look at their love for missionary... not the kind with the book carts. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Governing Body & Stress: 'Refreshing' Counsel for Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Jesus Christ of the Bible invited people to seek him out for refreshment. What do we find when we examine the lifestyle of a Jehovah's Witness? Less stress? We take a look at the Governing Body's advice on managing stress... and how it impacts those inside Jesus' 'organization.' TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Governing Body Asks Jehovah's Witnesses: "Is Telling the Truth Important?"
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses are the most 'honest' men in all the universe, just ask them. This week they produced an article entitled "Is Truth Important Anymore?" Taking a brief look at their history, should they be commenting on 'truth?' What do we find when we examine the organization they call 'the Truth?' TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Blinded by the Light: Why Can't Jehovah's Witnesses See the Obvious?
episodes.description: Do you love someone trapped inside ‘the truth?’ With all the recent changes inside Jehovah’s Witnesses, many wonder why they can’t see the obvious: the ‘organization’ is a man-made cult. The answers are complex. We explore several reasons why good people can’t see what is being done to them… and how we can help. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Governing Body Fantasy: Do Governments Fear Jehovah's Witnesses and Book Carts?
episodes.description: In a recent 'dramatic Bible reading,' on Jesus' website, the Governing Body is reminding world governments that Revelation is all about them... and that they're on notice! Despite 110 armed conflicts happening on earth today, world leaders are most concerned with nine guys in upstate New York, their book carts and their inauguration as kings. It's all in full color! TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Insulting Jehovah's Witnesses: Highlights from Governing Body Update #3 & May 2024 JW Broadcasting
episodes.description: In Governing Body Update #3 Jesus directs his guys in New York to clarify his recent fashion changes... because the ‘Great Teacher’ has been struggling with clear communication lately. Not to be outdone, a Governing Body helper reminds Jehovah’s Witnesses that they are all ‘sheep’… without putting any thought to how a sheep’s story ends… or uh, did he? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Gaslighting Jehovah's Witnesses: 'The Governing Body Never Lies?'
episodes.description: In a recent JW Broadcast, Brother Gary Breaux assured the universe that the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses 'never lies' and 'we can trust them.' Let's do some fact checking. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses on Foreknowledge & Predestination: Back to the Future?
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses wants you to believe that God is omniscient and omnipotent. They teach millions that he wields his power over space and time selectively, much like choosing you're favorite Spotify play list... and that creates many questions. Let's dive into the unexplainable... including how his ambivalence influences 'free will.' DeLorean not included. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How Jehovah's Witnesses Appeal to 'Ego': Privileges, Title Chasing & more!
episodes.description: All people want to be seen, heard ... and loved. The human ego is essential to a healthy life. However, with a quick look at their history, it's easy to see that the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses have found ways to manipulate the egos of over eight million people. How do they do it? We take a look at the subtle programming utilized by the nine guys in upstate New York. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Holy Spirit Has a Shelf Life - Will the Governing Body Scrub the Watchtower Library?
episodes.description: How long before the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses begins to revise history and limit access to their past nuggets of 'holy spirit?' The Watchtower Online Library contains hidden treasures that are available to all! But with recent court losses and their desire to trap younger generations, will they scrub some of their stupidity of the past? Listen in. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Predicting the Next Three 'New Light' Changes in Jehovah's Witnesses!
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses have been very busy receiving 'new light.' from Jesus Christ. It's a pattern. What will they change next? We predict the next three changes in 'god's organization'... and how it will impact future citizens of paradise. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jesus' Priorities For Jehovah's Witnesses: Women's Pants, Neckties & How to Shun
episodes.description: Governing Body Update #2 gave us a glimpse into the mind of King Jesus Christ of Jehovah's Witnesses. Taking time out of his imminent plans to kill everyone who disagrees with his nine guys in upstate New York, he has informed the universe that 'his people' can now greet disfellowshipped people. Not to be overlooked is that the sisters can now toss their razors and wear pants... joining all the bearded brothers who no longer have to wear a suit & tie. Listen in as we discuss the latest round of 'new light' from heaven. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Are Jehovah's Witnesses a Cult?
episodes.description: Answers vary. But why not let the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses answer that question for themselves? As it turns out, they've had a lot to say about what makes a cult. We take a look at THEIR definition of a 'cult' from their own literature, allegedly written under the direction of holy spirit. Their answer may surprise you. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Are Jehovah's Witnesses Being Manipulated?
episodes.description: Many wonder how Jehovah's Witnesses can't see the obvious: that the Governing Body is manipulating their minds. When a person breaks free from 'the truth,' they are often angry at being duped. We look at how the nine guys in upstate New York and their predecessors have been doing it for over a century... and why it works. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: 'Unbelieving Mates' Dishonest Intent, Horrifying Counsel & more!
episodes.description: Nothing is off limits to the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses... and that includes your unbaptized mate. What does that look like for the Witness and their unknowing spouse? Both parties suffer. We take a look at decades of counsel from the 'faithful & discreet slave' that ranges from dishonest... to deadly. TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Has Jehovah Always Had an Organization? Is 'Noah's Ark' Sinking?
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses claim that god has always had a visible 'organization' here on the earth. They claim the history of their organization goes back to Adam & Eve, that Noah's Ark is an ancient symbol for their printing and real estate empire... and all of this despite centuries where no one can prove an organization existed. Why does the Almighty need an organization? Why didn't his Son mention it in the Bible? Where was it from 98 A.D. until 1879? Is "Noah's Ark" taking on water? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Strange World of 'Forgiveness' Inside Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: To forgive is divine... nowhere should that be more evident than inside the 'best and happiest people on earth,' Jehovah's Witnesses. But does the culture encourage forgiveness? How do you get Jehovah's forgiveness? What does it look like to forgive someone inside the organization? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How Leaving 'The Fantasy' Behind Impacts a Jehovah's Witness
episodes.description: The entire life of a Jehovah's Witness is based on a fantasy created by Judge Joe Rutherford in 1935 that includes witnessing people they love resurrected and living together forever on a paradise earth. But what happens when they realize it's a lie? What's the impact emotionally? How do they face the rest of their lives? TWITTER: @exjwpodcast INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: What's Wrong With Being a Jehovah's Witness? Can I Fake It?
episodes.description: Once you know something is wrong, a Jehovah’s Witness faces complex questions about their future. What should they do? Can they fake it? Can they live an authentic life ‘under the radar?’ A few things to consider…TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: When it Comes to 'Doomsday' Jehovah's Version is Best!
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses wants us all to know that they're not a 'doomsday cult'... even as they base the entire religion on an earth wide destruction that features the forces of nature, including a flesh eating scourge. Who takes the lead in this event? Them. Listen in on decades of proof that the entire 'religion' points to a.... doomsday.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Prayer"- Does Jehovah Send Us to Voicemail?
episodes.description: Prayer is arguably the most personal of all Jehovah's Witness habits. But the act of prayer, as taught by the Governing Body, comes with a long list of questions, including a few regarding Jehovah's character... and how effective it is as a form of intimate communication. Join us as we take a look at prayer, as taught by Jehovah's Witnesses.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How Do Jehovah's Witnesses View Secrets?
episodes.description: Can you keep a secret? Jehovah's Witnesses have lots of them... and it starts at the top with Jehovah himself. The Governing Body claims that true religion has no secrecy, even as they shell out millions of dollars to keep their secrets hidden from the world. We take a look at the history of secrecy inside the organization they call 'the truth.'TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Greatest Hits Volume II: Sneezing, Charity & Bathroom Breaks
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses claim to be the 'voice of Jesus Christ' and the only true source of wisdom. With a long history of 'interesting' counsel, join us for our second installment of their Greatest Hits grab bag where we tackle what to say when you have boogers, how not to drink beverages and why charity is a big 'no-no' in 'god's organization.'TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Shepherds That Don't Shepherd? Why Congregation Elders Fail Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: In their own words, Jehovah's Witness elders are portrayed as shepherds and healers who are consumed with knowing and nurturing each member of the congregation. However, few Witnesses seem to have that experience. Are elders dependable protectors of God's sheep? We take a look...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Beards: Millions Now Living Will Never Shave!
episodes.description: In a Friday news dump on December 15, 2023, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses relayed a message from heaven, giving men permission to grow hair on their faces. After almost a century of telling men how to suppress their hair follicles, they will now sport a new style as they remind the rest of us that we are in year 110 of the 'last days.' How should we view this 'new light' from Jesus' guys? Listen in.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: 2023 Jehovah's Witnesses Year in Review: When Paradise Burns!
episodes.description: Move over 1914, 1919 and 1975! 2023 was a historic year for Jesus and his Governing Body in upstate New York! We take a look at a few of the highlights that made year 109 of the 'Last Day's' one to remember! TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Leaving Jehovah's Witnesses? The Only Promise You Need to Consider
episodes.description: Despite claims to the contrary, many Jehovah’s Witness that leave the ‘organization’ continue to hold onto Christian beliefs. They leave with fear that they not only lost their family, friends and religion… but God himself. We take a look at the power of promises… and an overlooked Biblical guarantee that proves you can dump the Governing Body… and continue your relationship with God. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Worldly People" - Insulting the Very People You're Here to Save
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses consider anyone outside their organization as a "worldly person" that is alienated from God and controlled by Satan the Devil. The end result is a life without normal relationships... and a morbid belief that their neighbors, schoolmates, and co-workers are doomed to destruction... creating an awkward dynamic where they insult the very people they claim committed to saving.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Three Things We Learn About Jesus From Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Despite Jesus Christ never mentioning the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses in the Bible, they claim he chose them personally and that they alone have rare insights into the King. We take a look at three things the nine guys in upstate New York teach us about history's most important person... and well... the guy in the Gospels looks a lot different since choosing Jehovah's Witnesses as his 'organization.'TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "New Light" The Governing Body's Shameless Lack of Apology or Embarrassment
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses laid the groundwork for the future of the religion during the 2023 Annual Meeting. With an admission that they're neither inspired nor infallible, they will continue to move forward demanding strict obedience from their followers. With a long history of doctrines that wasted and ended lives, they offer no apology... nor are they embarrassed. What is a Jehovah's Witness to do?TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Three Reasons Why Jehovah's Witnesses Don't Just Leave the "Organization"
episodes.description: With all the changes and the insanity Jehovah’s Witnesses have been subjected to in 2023… and throughout their history… why don’t they just leave the organization? Why to do they ‘take it?’ Unfortunately, leaving isn’t that easy. We take a look at the reasons why millions of mostly good, well intentioned people stay inside an ever changing, deceitful organization. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The "Dumbing Down" of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Remember when Jehovah's Witnesses pretended to be teachers and Bible scholars? The Governing Body has successfully been 'dumbing down' the religion for over twenty years. Gone are the debates on the King of the North & South, Gog of Magog,  or what every horn means on the beasts of Revelation. The pretense of 'depth' has been replaced with less meetings, disappearing publications, book carts, tablets, televangelism and kids cartoons. We take a look at the Great Dumbing Down of Jehovah's Witnesses.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: What it Means to "Wait on Jehovah"
episodes.description: When all else fails... and it will... a Jehovah's Witness is told to 'wait on Jehovah.' From basic questions regarding their doctrines, to irresponsible counsel that puts them in potential danger, the Governing Body has succeeded in fooling millions of innocent people to wait for an invisible sky god that has been in hiding since the beginning of time. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Sheep: When Woolly Livestock is Your Spirit Animal
episodes.description: The relationship between a farm animal and Jehovah's Witnesses is painfully profound. Leveraging an ancient book written by shepherds and goat herders, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses has spent over a century creating millions of  'sheep like' followers. We take a look at the painful similarities between the docile livestock and millions of good people believing anything said by the guys in upstate New York. We may have spotted a wolf in sheep's clothing....TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: 2023 Annual Meeting of Jehovah's Witnesses: Nothing Matters Anymore
episodes.description:
Jesus' guys in upstate New York are at it again. The 2023 Annual Meeting featured the Governing Body destroying the entire theology of Jehovah's Witnesses... while the audience they're gaslighting giggles along. We take a look at how everyone can now skip the cult experience and STILL live forever, as well as the news that Jehovah will no longer be collecting your gifts of 'godly devotion,' otherwise known as your field service time... and so much more.
TWITTER: @exjwpodcast
INSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The World is Ending! Where is the Urgency Among Jehovah's Witnesses?
episodes.description: Mankind is on the clock, so we should expect to see a hyper sense of urgency in the habits of Jehovah's Witnesses. As god's one and only source of salvation, what do we observe in their meetings, preaching and organization? Can you feel the desperate attempts to save every precious soul from behind the book carts? TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Satan & Jehovah's Witnesses: A Love Story
episodes.description: Of all the bad guys in human history, Satan the Devil stands alone. He's in control of everything, including governments, religion, big business and social media. Why care? Because he has a special relationship with Jehovah's Witnesses... particularly the Governing Body. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Three Things Proving the Governing Body Doesn't Care About Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Does Jesus guys on earth even care about 8 million+ Jehovah's Witnesses? How about the rest of mankind? We take a look at three things that caused this former elder to reach the conclusion that they don't. Children, martyrdom... and 'new light'...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Judicial Meetings: A History, Perversion & More in Jehovah's Star Chambers
episodes.description: When a baptized Jehovah's Witness sins, they're subjected to a 'star chamber' like meeting with a judicial committee, including three random men who decide if they're 'sorry enough' to stay in the congregation. Where did this come from? Is it found in the Bible? Why are these shepherds asking me THESE questions?? The Governing Body tells us this is both necessary and every sinner will 'always be treated kindly'... reality shows us something different...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Changes" - Jehovah Never Changes...or Does He??
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses believe that "Jehovah never changes"... because Malachi told them so in the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures. The same authority goes on to say that Jesus is the same yesterday, today and forever. But when you compare that with the organization they set up on earth to save all the rest of us, the questions begin... starting with 'why have there been so many changes?' We take a look at how uncomfortable change is... and if you need an organ transplant or are a life long pioneer... listen in. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Erosion of "Self" - How Jehovah's Witnesses Steal Your Identity
episodes.description: A person has a lot to lose by associating with Jehovah's Witnesses. But perhaps the most devastating is the loss of 'self' or identity. Like all high control cults, leadership requires conformity, from and children and adults. How does one lose themselves as a Jehovah's Witness? Listen in.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & War: A Sordid History of 'Excitement' Around Tragedy
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are obsessed with two, three letter words. You know the first one, the second is WAR. Jehovah was sure to share his warmongering in great detail in his book to mankind... and his guys on earth, the Governing Body, have found a way to make the tragic conflicts of the past century all about them. We take a limited look back... listen in.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Why Do Jehovah's Witnesses Need "40 Billion Pieces of Literature?"
episodes.description: At 2 Timothy 3:16, 17 Jehovah's Witnesses are told that reading the Bible makes them "fully competent, completely equipped for every good work." It raises a question: If Jehovah provided a perfect book, claiming it was all they ever needed for a relationship with him, why did he create the Watchtower Bible & Tract Society? Why have book carts? Was Jehovah kidding when he had that put in the Bible? Is there a reason Watchtower & Awake magazine are piling up in laundromats? Listen in...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah Needs Your Money! Donations, ATMs, Real Estate & More!
episodes.description: Jehovah needs your money. Despite being all powerful and the creator of all things, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses assure us he still needs cash... and he will take it from anyone, including children and 'poor people.' When not monitoring 'donations', he spends time investing in property on a planet he says he will soon destroy. So many questions.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "That's a Conscience Matter" - The Voice Jehovah's Witnesses Ignore
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are taught that they have an inner voice that guides them through life, helping them make decisions and can make you feel good or bad about yourself. What is the voice in their head? Where did it come from and how do I make sure mine works right? Should I trust this voice? What is a 'conscience matter' … and does it even matter? TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: A Closer Look at How Jehovah's Witnesses Define "Perfection"
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are constantly reminded that they're flawed. It's no wonder their main message includes a hope of future 'perfection.' But what does that even mean? Will I be a superhero? Will a lifetime of fruit and veggies taste different? Will I have six pack abs? We take a look at the subject of 'perfection' as told to us by the nine guys in upstate New York!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Your Thoughts Are Not Your Own: Jehovah & His Guys Are Inside Your Head
episodes.description: The battle for your mind starts early in Jehovah's Witnesses. Each repetitive meeting, convention or piece of literature serves as a reminder that your thoughts need to be in line with the nine guys in upstate New York. In addition, each publisher, young or old, is reminded that Jehovah lives inside your head, examining what you're thinking about at any moment... anyone else find that … creepy? TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Divorce, Separation, Remarriage & Unbelieving Mates Among Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Love is in the air... until it's not. Your marriage is not your own when you're a Jehovah's Witness. Life's most intimate relationship includes a 'three fold cord': the 'organization.' We look at divorce among 'god's people,' including the potentially dangerous, man made rules that 'allow' people to separate and remarry. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Violence is Bad!" Unless You're Jehovah and the Governing Body
episodes.description: How does Jehovah compare to Bugs Bunny and Ironman? Jehovah's Witnesses have been told 'violence is bad' for over a century, including endless counsel regarding entertainment, sports and more. It begs a few questions: have they read Jehovah's book the Bible? Do they know how he has handled problems in the past? Why is Star Wars so bad, but violent convention videos okay? Even more important, are they familiar with how Jehovah ends this whole story?TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Dynamic Duo: How Gossip & Slander Poison the Congregations of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: The culture of Jehovah's Witnesses is filled with pitfalls. When your schedule every week includes another meeting in a windowless building where you listen to the same messages year after year, your mind begins to wander... and it usually wanders into everyone else's business. Despite the Bible's command to shun gossipers and those that slander, the body of elders will do nothing to stop the runaway mouths and imaginations of those in their congregation. Many times, the elders and their wives are top contributors. Let's take a look at the damage and hypocrisy caused by the 'dynamic duo' of gossip & slander!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Friendship: It's Conditional
episodes.description: What does friendship look like inside the world of Jehovah's Witnesses? Will they truly give up their lives for each other? How about a better seat at a District Convention? Like every relationship within the organization, friendships are dependent on many conditions... and decades of loyalty can be gone in seconds.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Stealing Innocence: Why Jehovah's Witness Children are in Danger
episodes.description: The world of a child within Jehovah's Witnesses is wrought with danger. Aside from the refusal of 'god's organization' to protect children and turn predators over to the authorities, there are other, more subtle dangers a child faces when they are born into the organization. Dangers surrounding discipline, medical help... and perhaps the most insidious of all: a calculated brainwashing that the Governing Body encourages from infancy. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Personality Test: Love, Justice, Wisdom & Power
episodes.description: Let's put the 'Jehovah' of Jehovah's Witnesses to a personality test! The Governing Body claims he has four main personality traits: Love, Justice, Wisdom and Power... but what do we find when we examine that claim? What happens when we put each quality to the test? The answers may surprise you. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Panic in Paradise: Marriage, Resurrection & Single Life After Armageddon
episodes.description: The subject of marriage in a perfect paradise earth has set many Jehovah's Witnesses into a panic for decades. Based on Jesus words at Luke 20:34-36, the Governing Body has made claims that we will not be able to remarry a resurrected spouse in paradise and they get to live alone for all eternity while still seeing you daily. What about single people? "The faithful and discreet slave" have gone back and forth on their future and most of it depends on if or when they die!? Listen in as we watch Jesus guys tie themselves in knots trying to explain their reading comprehension issues. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Greatest Hits Volume I: Golden Age, Beth Sarim & Space Travel!
episodes.description: When you're directed by the Jehovah and his Son, you're bound to produce some of the universe's most memorable moments! In our first ever installment of JW Greatest Hits, this former elder reaches into the grab bag to look at three unforgettable gifts given to mankind by the leadership of Jehovah's Witnesses: The Golden Age magazine, Beth Sarim and one sentence in a 1986 book that had some of the brothers preparing Star Trek uniforms (now that Tony Morris is out, tight pants are back in!).TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Revelation: How Monsters, Whores & More All Point to Jehovah's Witnesses!
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses have had a lot to say about the Bible book of Revelation. Starting with Charles Taze Russell, who claimed he was 'the mouthpiece of God', they have written and claimed as fact FIVE publications interpreting a book that God wrote himself. Listen in as we take a look back at those five books, including claims that Revelation prophesied about vacuum cleaners, that angels blowing trumpets is about Ohio U.S.A …. and much more!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Last Days: Pyramids,1914, Four Horses... Mankind on the Clock!
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are regularly reminded that they're living in 'the last days' … a time period marked by endless misery all pointing to a conclusion that in itself is odd. Where did this teaching come from? How does it affect JW's? 109 years into the 'last days', we are still waiting for them to end...and  we have some questions.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Elders & Holy Spirit: A Closer Look at the "Princes" Among Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are taught that their congregation elders are appointed by holy spirit; that this magical force... that no one can explain, both guides and directs them in everything that they do. But if this is true, it raises both comical and serious questions about them as men, … as well as Jehovah and Jesus. Join us as we take a closer look at the guys they claim are 'princes' on the earth.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Governing Body's "Inspired" Authority: We Speak for God... Sometimes
episodes.description: The Governing Body demands strict obedience from eight million plus Jehovah's Witnesses today. Their self proclaimed authority spans almost two centuries, with bold reminders that they are 'god's mouthpiece' and that they alone receive instructions directly from Jesus Christ. With a long history of changing doctrines, mistakes and ever changing policies... they then say, in print, that "Jesus never said we would be perfect..." We have some questions: Are they inspired or infallible? Should we obey their authority? TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Biggest Lie of All: You Can Live Forever on a Paradise Earth
episodes.description: Eight million+ Jehovah's Witnesses base their entire lives on the belief that they may never die and will live forever on a paradise earth, complete with pet elephants, perfect food, perfect health and surrounded by generations of their resurrected family members. The Governing Body commands them to sacrifice immediate happiness to spread this 'message' to billions of people not yet baptized into the religion. But there's a problem: the Bible never mentions a paradise earth hope... and neither did their king, Jesus Christ during his visit to earth. Jesus forgot all about this 'hope'... until 1935. Join us as we unpack the lie that steals time … and lives...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: What a Bleeding Rulebreaker Teaches Us About the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: In Part III and our final installment of Story Time with the King, we take a look at an often overlooked and underrated story from the Bible in Mark Chapter 5, where we meet a woman suffering with a flow of blood for twelve years. Knowing that the storyteller, Jesus Christ himself, chose the nine guys in upstate New York to lead all of mankind into paradise, those same guys surely understand the finer points of this story, right? How to handle the mental and physical pain of eight million+ Jehovah's Witnesses? How to handle sin? We take a closer look... and we have some questions!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Prodigal Son: Why Over Eight Million Jehovah's Witnesses Miss the Point
episodes.description: Our second installment of Story Time with the King: The Prodigal Son! In one of Jesus' most powerful parables, he sets the tone for how he expects Jehovah's Witnesses to treat people, including those that have committed serious sins. Where did procedures like judicial committees, disfellowshipping, requests for reinstatement and more, come from? So how does the Governing Body explain their actions?   Let's take a look at the main characters and what the King of Jehovah's Witnesses expects from his guys in upstate New York.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How a Guy & His Donkey Expose the Ignorance of the Governing Body
episodes.description: Episode One of a three part series entitled Story Time With the King; a special look at three Bible parables that come from the leader of the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses, Jesus Christ himself! This week, the Good Samaritan from Luke 10! Who are the main players? What should we take away from this story? Some history, some laughs... and more importantly, some questions: who in this powerful story most closely resembles Jesus' guys in upstate New York?#jehovahswitness #exjw #governingbody #jehovahswitnesses TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Tortured Life of a Gay Jehovah's Witness - Part II
episodes.description: In our second installment on the messaging a gay Jehovah's Witness is exposed to, we take a look at the bizarre, cruel teachings from the Governing Body, including those directed at teenagers and how congregation elders handle the pain of a closeted gay person.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses and the Attack on Gay People - Part I
episodes.description: For decades, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses has been attacking gay people. A gay person, including children and teenagers, face a steady  diet of ignorant and cruel speech for simply being themselves. The results to gay individuals is devastating, including the constant reminder that Jehovah hates them and they face destruction. We unpack the insanity promoted by leadership that they claim is directed by Jesus Christ himself.#jehovahswitness #exjw #gay #watchtower #governingbody TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Mental Health: The Making of a Crisis
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are exposed to an onslaught of negative information. When it comes to mental health, many live a life of silent pain... or worse. While leadership has somewhat softened on receiving professional help, the message is still the same: read the Bible more and go out in field service; seeing a therapist is a personal decision. However, there are generations of former JW's who never sought help; with many stories ending in tragedy. We take a look at the 'inspired' counsel they gave to millions of people suffering from mental health issues and the end result.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Tony Morris Story: When Jesus Fires a King!
episodes.description: After being appointed by means of holy spirit ...by Jesus Christ himself, Tony Morris was 'fired' from his kingly post as a member of the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses. Let's take a look back at his life at the top, including his connection to Charles Taze Russell, the rare ex Governing Body Hall of Fame he is now a part of, as well as some supposition, predictions and 'guesses'... and as always, we got questions!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Apostasy: Why the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses Has it All Wrong
episodes.description: The Big A. Apostasy. No word or accusation is feared more by a baptized Jehovah's Witness. If you question anything from the ten guys in upstate New York, they can destroy your entire life, alienate you from family and friends... and that's the 'easy' part. They plan on killing you at Armageddon. We take a look at how the Governing Body has apostasy all wrong, how it damages millions... and prove from their magic book that they clearly don't know their 'god' … or his son.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Dangers of Entertainment: Jesus is Worried About TV & the Movies!
episodes.description: In the Governing Body's ongoing attempt to control every aspect of a Jehovah's Witness life, they have always had plenty to say about television and movies. But while counseling us all on the dangers of E.T., the Brady Bunch and Netflix & chill, they seemed to forget about the content of their own modern day videos.... and uh, that book Jehovah game them. This episode is:Rated R...for RIDICULOUS Under 17 Requires Accompanying Baptized Parents for Section on the BibleStrong Content Including: Absurdity, Laughter, SarcasmTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Do Jehovah's Witnesses Follow the Bible? Or … Men?
episodes.description: The claim is that Jehovah wrote the perfect book for all of mankind. A book that makes you 'fully competent' and 'completely equipped' for anything life throws at you. Do Jehovah's Witnesses really believe that? Do they lean into the Bible when making decisions about birthdays, healthcare, relationships and more? We take a look a look at what "God's Word' says versus billions of pages of other books and magazines... and we have some questions! NOTE: no trees were harmed or ink used in bringing you this information.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Persecution: Obsession & Tragedy Among Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses has an obsession with persecution. Tragically, thousands of JW's have died remaining loyal to a publishing company; some of which was avoidable! Today, publishers are consistently fed messaging, images and videos reminding them they too will face persecution. Why? Are children exposed to this stuff? Are world governments really worried about people preaching fairy tales and passing on birthday cake? We take a look.WARNING: Their literature features gruesome experiences, some of which will be shared.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Governing Body Has Two New 'Kings' - A Look at Jesus' Arrangement, Past & Present
episodes.description: Jesus is making moves! The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses added two new 'kings' to their ranks this week... at a time when they teach that the world is ending. Any second now. We take a look at who the new guys are, how such universe altering news was handled and where the entire 'doctrine' of the Governing Body came from. HINT: no apostles were interviewed.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Bad Association: How Classmates, Workmates, Dinah and Bugs Bunny 'Spoil Useful Habits'
episodes.description: It's tattooed onto your brain from a young age as a Jehovah's Witness: 1 Corinthians 15:33, "Bad associations, spoil useful habits." The Governing Body likes to point at Dinah of Bible fame, as someone who made a bad decision on friends. Let's take a look at how everyone outside the 'organization' is a 'bad person' looking to corrupt your character, including the kids in the neighborhood, your workmates, the Road Runner and Wile E. Coyote and anyone else not following the eight guys in upstate New York!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Dating in Jehovah's Witnesses - 'Flirting' with Disaster
episodes.description: Love is in the air … but it comes with rules if you're a Jehovah's Witness! We take a look at the Governing Body's rules on dating and courtship, including what qualifies as dating, chaperones, what it means for women... and a look at wise King Solomon's pointers on all things romance from the Song of Solomon!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Parenting in Jehovah's Witnesses: A Culture of Failure, Loopholes & Denial
episodes.description: Being a parent in Jehovah’s Witnesses is filled with some bizarre and painful stuff. A parent’s entire purpose in life isn’t to enjoy their children, but to get them to a baptism pool before Armageddon hits. In a set of bizarre observations, VERY few JW parents set a good example, study with their children or even believe this is a life and death matter. When the child leaves the organization as an adult, they shift to believing in ‘spiritual loopholes’ that aren’t true… and don’t seem to take responsibility for their failure to make little Jehovah’s Witnesses. We take a look at the bizarre thinking and actions of JW parents, both good and bad… and share the Governing Body’s teaching that any child not baptized as one of their disciples is doomed to destruction at Armageddon. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Why Don't Jehovah's Witnesses Celebrate Christmas?
episodes.description: Why are Jehovah's Witnesses forbidden to celebrate Christmas? Their website, built by 'holy spirit' and the Governing Body, gives four reasons why they aren't allowed to celebrate Jesus birth, have a tree, put up lights or give gifts to family. We unwrap these presents from heaven … and what's inside is both insulting and absurd. #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #christmas #jehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Governing Body & the Pharisees: Heavy Loads, Swallowing Camels and Delusion
episodes.description: In perhaps the most striking example of how deluded the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses are, we take a look at their boss' Jesus diatribe against a group he hated during his visit to planet earth... a little group known as the Pharisees... and how the Governing Body either has comprehension issues, Jesus changed his mind about the Pharisees when he got back to heaven or those guys in upstate New York decided on their own to steal and emulate the playbook of a group that their King referred to as 'serpents set to burn in Gehenna' … Laughs will be had.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Are Jehovah's Witnesses the 'Happiest People on Earth?'
episodes.description: For the better part of a century, the Governing Body have claimed that Jehovah's Witnesses are the 'happiest people on earth.' But a quick look at the people inside a Kingdom Hall raise a lot of questions. Not only do they look unhappy, but they're regularly reminded that any happiness they DO experience isn't deserved anyway. And if you don't like that message... there is a fireball waiting for you at Armageddon. Let's take a look at their 'happiness' and how this can go from comedy to tragedy. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & the CULTure of Control: Hair, Skin, Dress & more!
episodes.description: The world of Jehovah’s Witnesses is all about control. The Governing Body have built a CULTure that eliminates personality, individuality, self esteem…. In favor of compliance to man made rules found nowhere in the Bible. Listen in as we examine how and why millions are led to believe that Jehovah and his son Jesus, are very concerned with fashion, hairstyles, cosmetics and more. NOTE: 40,000 precious children will die today in developing countries from lack of food and water. But we are blessed to know that the Almighty isn’t too distracted by all that to be sure that men are shaving.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Congregation Elders, How & Why? The 7 Archetypes of the 'God Squad'
episodes.description: Each congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses is led by a Body of Elders, a mish mash of personalities that publishers are supposed to believe will shepherd and guide them through the 'last days of this system of things.' However, most know they are primarily enforcers for the Governing Body. Where did this come from? We take a look at the 'personalities' that make up a typical group of elders. Warning: Laughs are had.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Alcohol: What's All the "Buzz" About?
episodes.description: Despite the Bible's command against drunkenness, overdrinking has worked it's way into the everyday life of Jehovah's Witnesses... and it's not just the publishers. From biblical characters held up as examples, to the modern day Governing Body... many of them can't resist a stiff drink. Listen in as we take a look at why getting buzzed, tipsy or straight hammered drunk is often overlooked in JW culture. We have some stories.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Do Jehovah's Witnesses Have 'Free Will?' A Tree, a Fish & Consequences
episodes.description: The Governing Body twists itself in knots to get eight million people to believe that they 'want' to serve a publishing company in upstate NY. We take a look at the concept of 'free will' as taught to Jehovah's Witnesses and how a tree, a fish and many other factors lead to consequences that end in misery.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Why Field Service is a Scam: Coffee Breaks 108 Years into the Last Days
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are known for their door to door, house to house preaching work. But does it make sense? Is it effective? Was it even commanded? We take a look at the misery of field service, from oversized car groups and 'not at homes'... to why they do it all. Listen in!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How Jehovah's Suspect Character Affects Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses attempt to use the Bible and their 'inspired' publications to paint a picture of a loving god who makes decisions in the best interest of his children here on earth. We take a look at examples, past & present … and it raises some QUESTIONS! TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Love Your Neighbor" - No Charity, No Help, But Here's a Book!
episodes.description: “Love your neighbor”… seems like a simple command. Why don’t Jehovah’s Witnesses get involved in their community? Give to charities? Feed the homeless? Donate clothing or money to those in need? The Governing Body discourages it and frequently ask that all resources be sent to them in New York. But it’s WORSE than you think! The needs and protection of children, as well as those in life or death circumstances are ignored in favor of … ‘hope’ in a fairy tale… and a Watchtower magazine.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah’s Witnesses & the Assault on Children’s Minds
episodes.description: For almost a century there has been an assault on the minds of young children inside of Jehovah's Witnesses, including a weekly meeting schedule, publications featuring frightening illustrations of death & destruction, subtle cartoons, as well as 'counsel' that creates shame and low self esteem. In 2022, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses stated to millions that they consider babies to be 'enemies of God.' Aside from the threat of physical danger within a Kingdom Hall, children are being exposed to messaging that does lifelong damage. We shine a light on the dangers innocent children are facing inside the 'religion.' TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness End Game: Baptism; It's a Trap!
episodes.description: Baptism is all about controlling Jehovah's Witnesses. They are locking children as young as six years old into a lifetime of service to a publishing company in upstate New York. Baptism allows them to control every aspect of a person's life, young or old. We look at all the loopholes leveraged by parents, why a simple dunk in a pool opens you up to disfellowshipping or worse and their admission that their entire baptism process is found nowhere in the Bible. It's a trap!#jehovahwitnesses #exjw #baptism #disfellowshippingTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Flood, Noah's Ark and Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: Did you know that the Bible’s story of a global flood and Noah’s ark is historical fact?? The Governing Body of Jehovah’s Witnesses says so! If you ever wondered how a 600 year old guy, 270 carnivores in a boat and mountains of POOP provide a preview of a global genocide that God promised he would never do again, you’re not alone! We take a look at the major players, ask some valid questions and explore what this ‘story’ tells us about God himself! #jehovahwitnesses #exjw  TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: How Millions of Jehovah's Witnesses are Trapped by Fear & Guilt
episodes.description: It's the perfect cocktail served up by the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses: scare them and make them feel bad about it. Millions are trapped by the FEAR that they must stay in this organization... and then hit with guilt for knowing something is wrong. We take a look at these powerful 'weapons,' as well as share thoughts on breaking free.#jehovahwitnesses #exjw #watchtower #jw #governingbody TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Universal Sovereignty: Jehovah Can't Handle a Bully
episodes.description: When challenged by a bully.... his own 'son'... Jehovah decided to 'take the challenge' and let the bully torture all of his children to get a point across. Let's take a look at the details of this cornerstone doctrine of Jehovah's Witnesses and learn how Jehovah's name means more to him than anything else.... #jehovahwitnesses #exjw #watchtower #jw TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Witnesses: NEVER Confess Your Sins to the Elders: How & Why to Avoid!
episodes.description: Witnesses are taught that they must confess their sins to the elders to be forgiven. But that is NOT necessary. There is the mother of all 'loopholes' in print, rendering confessions, judicial committees and punishment completely unnecessary for the common JW... and it's been there for 50 years. Listen in on why a Jehovah's Witness should NEVER confess there sins to the elders or feel guilty in NOT doing so.#jehovahwitnesses #exjw #bible #elders #watchtower #governingbody TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "Going Beyond What is Written" - Jesus Needs the Governing Body?
episodes.description: Jehovah and Jesus aren't 'detail' guys. They need eight guys in upstate New York to talk to mankind for them. Despite the Bible saying it alone makes us ‘fully competent’ and ‘completely equips’ a person for a relationship with God, Jehovah’s Witnesses don’t believe it’s true. The Governing Body have outright ignored the 'rule' at 1 Corinthians 4:6: ‘never go beyond the things written.’ Remember when Jesus mentioned college, piercings, piñatas or disco? No? Neither do we. That's why Jesus needs these eight guys.#jehovahwitnesses #exjw #bible #cults #watchtower #governingbody TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Disfellowshipping & Jehovah's Witnesses Part II: Pain & Misery Since 1952
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses have millions believing that shunning is a 'loving arrangement." Disfellowshipping isn't taught in the Bible or by Jesus Christ in the Gospels. We take a look at how it started in 1952; why it was implemented, the list of sins that get a person shunned, how this effects any baptized JW, including children... and much more!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Disfellowshipping & Jehovah's Witnesses: A Timeline to Pain & Tragedy
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are shunned by everyone they love, including family and friends, if three guys in the B School consider them unrepentant after committing a serious sin. No love, no communication, no help. Unless they follow mundane steps over an undetermined amount of time to be reinstated, this punishment is for the remainder of their life. We take a look at how this started, how it is NOT Bible based, how Jesus forgot to mention it.... and how the guys in upstate New York have wielded it to create unbelievable misery, including death. (PART ONE)#jehovahwitnesses #exjw #disfellowshipping #shunning #cults #watchtower  TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Sex Part II: An "Oral" History of What Married People Can Do in the Bedroom
episodes.description: Without any foundation or instruction from the Bible they alone claim to understand, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses have a lot to say on how MARRIED people make love. A big 'no no' is anything involving your mouth or backdoor. When a husband and wife engage in anything 'oral' they risk being disfellowshipped from the congregation; losing everything. A look back at decades worth of leadership telling consenting, married adults how to touch each other in private … and the untold damage it has done to innocent people.#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Sex: The Governing Body is in Your Bedroom
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses are eager to control every aspect of a person's entire life... including sex. How do they manage to find themselves in the beds of consulting adults? We take a look at how eight guys in upstate New York convince millions just how married people should be doing the deed, their 'creative' interpretations of Greek words, how to keep your mouth to yourself and who is always watching... and of course, much more!#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses on Higher Education: Over One Hundred Years of Keeping People Dumbed Down
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses face a steady stream of subtle...and not so subtle propaganda against pursuing higher education.  The Governing Body targets young Jehovah's Witnesses with an ongoing guilt trip for wanting to pursue a college degree. With endless commentary on the dangers of college, university and against bettering yourself, they have kept millions from reaching their true potential … and under their control. We take a look back at how generations of JW's missed out on opportunities and how it continues to effect them.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & The Chosen Path of Ignorance
episodes.description: What shocks YOU the most about Jehovah’s Witnesses? I’m often asked that question. The answer probably differs for everyone, but let’s take a look at how millions of people devote themselves to a cult without ever knowing it’s history, reading the Bible or being able to explain their ‘life or death’ beliefs. How are innocent people held captive to a life of ignorance about their own ‘religion?’ Why do they choose to bury their heads in the sand on ‘generations,’ blood, birthdays and more? Why are most JW’s so uneducated, despite being baptized for decades?  We take a look at how the Governing Body of Jehovah’s Witnesses has molded millions of people into followers with a steady dose of fear and complacency that goes back over a century…and keeps millions of publishers coming to your door, unable to answer basic questions about their faith. Don’t worry… you won’t hear “I’ll need to research that and come back with an answer”… no ‘return visits here!#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses & Those Crazy Demons: Buff, Supernatural Perverts With All Access Passes
episodes.description: In our longest episode yet, we take a look at the Jehovah's Witnesses belief that invisible boogey men continue to influence our lives.  God wiped out the demon's families at the Flood, but then let them come home to heaven and what? Grab a snack? Only to send them right back to vulnerable mankind on earth to do it all over again. From a young age, adults and children alike are fed a steady diet of fear. Witnesses have been taught that everything from Smurfs, to music, toys, movies, album covers and that pair of socks you got at the garage sale, are potentially dangerous items highjacked by demons that want to come to your house. Let's talk urban legend, where all of this comes from... and several other sensitive questions you probably never considered... this week on Surviving Paradise! #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness Hypocrisy Ala Carte: Dodging Gluttons and Birthday Cake
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses are the definition of hypocrisy. As a teenager, I came up with the term "JW Ala Carte" when watching 'god's organization' pick and choose what Bible teachings they applied and which ones they ignored. Consider two: Why are Jehovah's Witnesses, including elders and circuit overseers, allowed to be so overweight when the Bible condemns gluttony? How can you punish a kid for celebrating a pagan birthday while mom wears a pagan wedding ring? ... and other observations!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: You Can Live Forever in Paradise on Earth: Jesus Missed the Memo... until 1932
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses believe that the Bible promises them eternal life on a paradise earth. It is their core teaching and what they use to attract people to the religion. They've devoted billions of pages of literature to illustrations showing paradise, wild animals as pets and the perfect fruit basket. But there is a problem: Jesus missed the memo and left it out of the Bible, his teachings...or even a mention. A hope that impacts billions in human history... nary a mention? No worries, he told his buddies in New York in 1932! Let's take a look at lie that traps millions of innocent people...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Judicial Committees: Three Guys and a Prayer
episodes.description: The infamous march to the B School. You did something naughty and now you get a visit with three elders... and your future is in their hands. Where did this come from? How does it work? Who are these three guys and why do they get to judge other people? Let's take a look at the Jehovah's Witness judicial committee arrangement.#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower  TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses - Delaying Your Happiness One Day at a Time
episodes.description: The Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses claim their religion is filled with 'the best and happiest people on earth' (Watchtower 1988 Mar 1 p.17) But that is far from 'the truth.' With a steady, weekly diet of fear and shame, leaders have been delaying people's happiness for over a century. What's been the result for those that have obeyed their counsel on having babies, creating a family, pursuing a career? Observations from a '70's kid and former elder...TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses on Resurrection: Good Guys, Bad Guys, 2nd Chances and Khakis!
episodes.description: A deep dive into what Jehovah's Witnesses teach regarding the resurrection to a paradise earth, including who gets in, who is left out for good, 2nd chances for some famous bad guys and a whole litany of questions surrounding how it all works! Why are they preaching again? #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #exjehovahswitness #watchtower TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Demeaning and Dangerous View of Women
episodes.description: Despite women making up most of the of the nearly 9 million members of Jehovah's Witnesses (including doing the bulk of the door to door preaching work) the self proclaimed 'mouthpiece of God on earth,' the Governing Body, continue to foster an often dangerous culture where women are disrespected and minimized. Let's look at some examples, including 'inspiring' comments made about women from their leadership and publications over the past century.TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses: Hypocrisy Ala Carte: Beards, Gyms, Blood & More!
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses live in a world built on hypocrisy. It starts with the idea that Jesus never spoke to apostates (uh... his whole ministry was to apostates) and covers everything from the evils of facial hair, working out in gyms, blood, the United Nations and so... much... more. When did I coin the phrase 'Christianity ala Carte' and how did it impact my life? Join us!#jehovahswitnesses #exjw #apostatesTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: "New Light" - How the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses Insults the Intelligence of Millions
episodes.description: Whether it's personal matters like sex and grooming or life altering doctrines like blood and organ transplants … or now their most comically embarrassing teaching on  'overlapping generations' leading back to 1914, the Governing Body of Jehovah's Witnesses claim they can change the foundation of their 'religion' with the flick of a light switch. Lifting a sentence out of Proverbs chapter four, these guys claim they're 'God's mouthpiece' to mankind and the Almighty himself allows billions to believe in error until He decides to give 'new light' to those special fellas in upstate New York....consequences be damned! Let's take a look at what "new light" means to the common Jehovah's Witness. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness End Game: Who Dodges the Fireballs at Armageddon?
episodes.description: Is it true that only Jehovah's Witnesses will dodge the fireballs at Armageddon? Let's unpack decades of eager anticipation for a mass genocide from the 'god of love, not fear' (1 John 4:18) and his chosen guys in upstate New York... after all, those guys were chosen by Jesus to help him decide who gets to be bird food... and who get's to live forever in khakis on a paradise earth!NOTE: still need to shave your face in paradise and dogs will now be on leashes. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: The Not So Faithful & "Discreet" Slave and Their Wild Inspirations!
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses claim that Jesus Christ chose them as his one and only organization for communication. Let's check in on what Jesus saw when he decided 'these guys' are the best of the best to represent him to all of mankind! Jesus sent them "inspiration" on everything from a parable turned into a prophecy about 8 guys in NY, to tinfoil, tonsils, male superiority and more! Listen in... laugh, cry, bang your head against the wall ... let's see what Jesus saw!#exjw #exjehovahswitness #jehovahswitnesses #apostate #exjwhumor #watchtower #governingbodyTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness Elders: Chosen by God Magic aka Holy Spirit?
episodes.description: Jehovah's Witnesses claim Jesus personally chooses all congregation elders by means of the all magical 'holy spirit'....otherwise known as 'the force' to Star Wars fans. How does Jesus make so many mistakes when choosing his guys to lead the congregation? Why does Jesus appoint men that have never read the bible or their own literature; that have family problems and like their booze? Or worse: commit crimes against children?! This former elder pulls back the curtain on the 'elder arrangement' and what really goes down in the B school!TWITTER: @exjwpodcastYouTube: Surviving ParadiseInstagram: survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: It's 'Partaker Watch' Season...Otherwise Know as Memorial, the JW Holiday
episodes.description: Memorial Season, it's the closest Jehovah's Witnesses get to a 'holiday.' Face it, it's all about seeing who 'partakes' of the crackers or wine... and with 1935 long gone, those with a Fast Pass to heaven continues to grow! Relive your favorite Memorial memories, take another look at the Passover and ask yourself how you ever believed this crap. TWITTER: @exjwpodcastYOUTUBE: Surviving ParadiseTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Introduction: Leaving Jehovah's Witnesses...and Paradise... Behind...
episodes.description: Why would anyone want to leave the 'spiritual paradise' that is Jehovah's Witnesses? We are prepared to give you well over 144,000 reasons why overlapping generations aren't a thing, facial hair is normal, Smurfs aren't demonized ... and Jehovah's Witnesses are a cult. In our first episode we cover 'who is this guy? where did he come from? And why is he starting a podcast now?'With each episode we will laugh, cry, talk old doctrine, the new 'religion' and what it was like to grow up in the 70's and 80's as a Jehovah's Witness. It's very likely we will stray into hard hitting subjects like the magic of the cheese danish, being a kid in a Kingdom Hall with no windows ... and how some of us went from teenagers chasing girls at District Conventions, to the elders that busted the next generation. Let's hang out ... heal, laugh, reminisce! TWITTER: @exjwpodcastInstagram: @survivingparadisepodcastTWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast

episodes.title: Surviving Paradise, an Ex-JW Podcast Trailer!
episodes.description: An ex-elder diving into the absurd, but often painful, 'spiritual paradise' of Jehovah's Witnesses. Featuring solo conversations, guest interviews with people I love and admire, in a safe space, where they can share their own musings, experiences and observations . We will cover the thoughtful to the random, including the culture, beliefs and history of the Jehovah's Witnesses. Join us! You can count your time....TWITTER: @exjwpodcastINSTAGRAM: survivingparadisepodcast
